mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_NAME , IS_ADMIN , TEAM_CODE , TEAM_ADMIN FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PW = #{memberPw}

SELECT MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_BIRTH , MEMBER_GENDER , MEMBER_TELL , IS_ADMIN , POSITION , TEAM_CODE , TEAM_NAME , TEAM_ADMIN , MEMBER_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME FROM MEMBER_VIEW WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}

SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE , BLACKMEMBER_CODE , BLACK_COMMENT ,(SELECT MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = MB.BLACKMEMBER_CODE) AS BLACK_NAME ,(SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM TEAM WHERE MEMBER_CODE = MB.BLACKMEMBER_CODE) AS BLACK_TEAM FROM MEMBER M, MEMBER_BLACKLIST MB WHERE M.MEMBER_CODE = MB.MEMBER_CODE (+)
